name: PRAYAAS - BADTE KADAM JINDAGI KI AUR
briefDescription: Objects of Society: - Child Education & Health Development1.	To provide the educational material to the child who are far away from it2.	To provide the healthy food for their mental and physical growth3.	To introduce them with Science & Technology4.	To provide them school uniform & other clothing material5.	To provide them medicine & free treatment6.	To introduce them with Social media, political science, Cultural activities and Sports7.	To make conscious them about the effect of harmful drugs
